frontmatter.author: Marko Toplak
frontmatter.title: Can Orange explore a 13 GB data set?
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: An experimental version of Orange supports much larger data sets. It never loads the whole data set into the working memory; data is only processed in small chunks. We show a case study on a 13 GB spectroscopy data set.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: An experimental version of Orange supports much larger data sets. It never loads the whole data set into the working memory; data is only processed in small chunks. We show a case study on a 13 GB spectroscopy data set.
